Cardiovascular Diseases/Vascular Diseases/Vasculitis/Systemic Vasculitis/Anti-Neutrophil Cytoplasmic Antibody-Associated Vasculitis/Microscopic Polyangiitis
Record.Description: A primary systemic vasculitis of small- and some medium-sized vessels. It is characterized by a tropism for kidneys and lungs, positive association with anti-neutrophil cytoplasmic antibodies (ANCA), and a paucity of immunoglobulin deposits in vessel walls.
